name: BLEP (Léana Terakopiantz, Arhair)
description:
BLEP is a simple top-down arcade game where you play a frog and try to survive by eating as many bugs as you can, and avoiding the dangers that come in your way.

It was made in 4 days for a school project.

Controls

Move with the A and D keys. Aim with the mouse, and shoot your tongue with left click.

Credits

Game Design : Antonin "Arhaïr" Voyeux & Léana Terakopiantz

Sound Design & 3D Modelling : Antonin "Arhaïr" Voyeux

Game Programming : Léana Terakopiantz

Everything was made entirely by ourselves.
